item.title: minio_policy
item.description:
MinIO-policy

权限控制

有时候场景是 只针对某个账号有权限read， 先将bucket设置成privacy, 再将这个账号的policy设置成 readonly

policy设置如下

S3 action: https://iam.cloudonaut.io/reference/s3.html

如何获取物理存储地址？

不可能！ 因为MinIO是将一个文件拆开存放到多个物理磁盘上，不是直接放到某个磁盘。

为什么MinIO可以保证一半节点不可用的时候，服务依然可用？

参考文章：https://www.cnblogs.com/FLY_DREAM/p/14587022.html

https://blog.csdn.net/sinat_27186785/article/details/52034588

纠删码

纠删码是一种恢复丢失和损坏数据的数学算法，目前，纠删码技术在分布式存储系统中的应用主要有三类，阵列纠删码（Array Code: RAID5、RAID6 等）、RS(Reed-Solomon)里德-所罗门类纠删码和 LDPC(LowDensity Parity Check Code)低密度奇偶校验纠删码。Erasure Code 是一种编码技术，它可以将 n 份原始数据，增加 m 份数据，并能通过 n+m 份中的任意 n 份数据，还原为原始数据。即如果有任意小于等于 m 份的数据失效，仍然能通过剩下的数据还原出来

item.title: matomo
item.description:
Matomo archive

研究下这个档案缓存 900s是如何生效的

namespace Piwik\Plugins\Actions; API.getDownloads

这里根据archive返回数据

$minDatetimeArchiveProcessedUTC 就是当前时间减去 900s.
ArchiveSelector 中判断archive的时间和 ​$minDatetimeArchiveProcessedUTC 哪个更早，如果archive 的时间更早，则这个archive就失效。

如果archive失效 ，则新增

matomo_archive_blob_2022_04 中的就是对应的二进制缓存

item.title: xdebug
item.description:
Xdebug

http://xdebug.org/

因为最近想看看matomo 源码，里面php的调用比较深，直接看代码不是很直观，所以需要有个工具debug

参考文章： https://cloud.tencent.com/developer/article/1591505

https://www.yisu.com/zixun/376908.html

容器内部操作

  1. 在容器内部安装xdebug
pecl install xdebug

  1. 修改php.ini

    zend_extension=/usr/local/lib/php/extensions/no-debug-non-zts-20200930/xdebug.so
   
   
#xdebug.remote_enable=1
#xdebug.remote_host=192.168.1.2
#xdebug.remote_port=9000
#xdebug.idekey=PHPSTORM
   
   
xdebug.mode=debug
xdebug.client_host=192.168.1.2
xdebug.client_port=9000
xdebug.collect_return=On
xdebug.idekey="PHPSTORM"
xdebug.log="/tmp/xdebug.log"

  2. 重启docker 让php配置生效

Phpstorm 的配置 操作

  1. 选择你的php interpreter (这步好像不需要)

  1. 配置xdebug port

  2. 配置 DBGp Proxy （这步好像也不需要)

  3. 配置server 注意右边的是容器内的路径

  4. 调试

按照如下步骤

点击validate

配置好path和url

点击Validate ，看到xdebug安装好了就行了，如果有异常再针对解决

chrome 插件安装

https://www.jetbrains.com/help/phpstorm/2021.2/browser-debugging-extensions.html?utm_source=product&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=PS&utm_content=2021.2

加断点试试,成功!

以下不用看

安装步骤 : http://xdebug.org/wizard

因为我是用docker启动的matomo，所以需要进到docker容器中安装xdebug

问题1： 直接卡在第二步，apt-get install php-dev 找不到package

推测是source 不对， 疯狂找源.

看报错应该是 php-dev这个包过期了

<!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/javax.mail/mail -->
<dependency>
    <groupId>javax.mail</groupId>
    <artifactId>mail</artifactId>
    <version>1.4.7</version>
</dependency>


  // 设置邮件服务器
        properties.setProperty("mail.smtp.host", "your.mail.server")
        properties.setProperty("mail.smtp.port", "your.port")
        properties.setProperty("mail.smtp.auth", "true")
        // 获取默认session对象
        val session = Session.getInstance(properties, object: Authenticator() {
            override fun getPasswordAuthentication(): PasswordAuthentication {
                return PasswordAuthentication("username", "password")
            }
        })

item.title: tar
item.description:
将多个文件打包并压缩

https://mkyong.com/java/how-to-create-tar-gz-in-java/

kotlin 代码

package com.xxx

import org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.tar.TarArchiveEntry
import org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.tar.TarArchiveOutputStream
import org.apache.commons.compress.compressors.gzip.GzipCompressorOutputStream
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service
import java.io.BufferedOutputStream
import java.io.IOException
import java.nio.file.Files
import java.nio.file.Path


@Service
class TarGzipService {
    // tar.gz few files
    @Throws(IOException::class)
    fun createTarGzipFiles(paths: List<Path>, output: Path?) {
        Files.newOutputStream(output).use { fOut ->
            BufferedOutputStream(fOut).use { buffOut ->
                GzipCompressorOutputStream(buffOut).use { gzOut ->
                    TarArchiveOutputStream(gzOut).use { tOut ->
                        for (path in paths) {
                            if (!Files.isRegularFile(path)) {
                                throw IOException("Support only file! $path")
                            }
                            val tarEntry = TarArchiveEntry(
                                path.toFile(),
                                path.fileName.toString()
                            )
                            tOut.putArchiveEntry(tarEntry)

                            // copy file to TarArchiveOutputStream
                            Files.copy(path, tOut)
                            tOut.closeArchiveEntry()
                        }
                        tOut.finish()
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

item.title: jsch
item.description:
Jsch

scp from java:http://www.jcraft.com/jsch/examples/ScpFrom.java.html

scp to java : http://www.jcraft.com/jsch/examples/ScpTo.java.html

kotlin 代码

package com.xxx

import com.jcraft.jsch.ChannelExec
import com.jcraft.jsch.JSch
import com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
import com.jcraft.jsch.Session
import com.jcraft.jsch.UserInfo
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service
import java.io.BufferedReader
import java.io.File
import java.io.FileOutputStream
import java.io.IOException
import java.io.InputStream
import java.io.InputStreamReader


@Service
class JschService {
    private val CONNECT_TIMEOUT = 30000
    private val log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(javaClass)

    fun createSession(userName:String, password:String, host:String, port:Int) :Session {
        val jsch = JSch()

        val session = jsch.getSession(userName, host, port)
        session.setPassword(password)
        val userInfo: UserInfo = object : UserInfo {
            override fun getPassphrase(): String? {
                println("getPassphrase")
                return null
            }

            override fun getPassword(): String? {
                println("getPassword")
                return null
            }

            override fun promptPassword(s: String): Boolean {
                println("promptPassword:$s")
                return false
            }

            override fun promptPassphrase(s: String): Boolean {
                println("promptPassphrase:$s")
                return false
            }

            override fun promptYesNo(s: String): Boolean {
                println("promptYesNo:$s")
                return true //notice here!
            }

            override fun showMessage(s: String) {
                println("showMessage:$s")
            }
        }

        session.userInfo = userInfo
        //session 可以复用
        session.connect(CONNECT_TIMEOUT) // making a connection with timeout.

        return session
    }

    @Throws(JSchException::class)
    fun remoteExecute(session: Session, command: String?): List<String?>? {
        val channel = session.openChannel("exec") as ChannelExec
        return try {
            remoteExecute(channel, command)
        } finally {
            if (channel != null) {
                try {
                    channel.disconnect()
                } catch (e: Exception) {
                    log.error("JSch channel disconnect error:", e)
                }
            }
        }
    }

    @Throws(JSchException::class)
    fun remoteExecute(channel: ChannelExec?, command: String?): List<String?>? {
        log.info(">> {}", command)
        val resultLines: MutableList<String?> = ArrayList()
        try {
            channel!!.setCommand(command)
            val input = channel.inputStream
            channel.connect(CONNECT_TIMEOUT)
            try {
                val inputReader = BufferedReader(InputStreamReader(input))
                var inputLine: String? = null
                while (inputReader.readLine().also { inputLine = it } != null) {
                    log.info("   {}", inputLine)
                    resultLines.add(inputLine)
                }
            } finally {
                if (input != null) {
                    try {
                        input.close()
                    } catch (e: Exception) {
                        log.error("JSch inputStream close error:", e)
                    }
                }
            }
        } catch (e: IOException) {
            log.error("IOcxecption:", e)
        }
        return resultLines
    }


    /**
     * 从远程拷贝文件
     */
    fun getRemoteFile(session:Session, remotePath:String, localPath:String) :String {
        val fos:FileOutputStream ?= null
        try {
            // exec 'scp -f rfile' remotely
            var rfile = remotePath.replace("'", "'\"'\"'")
            rfile= "'$rfile'"
            val command = " scp -f $rfile"
            val channel= session.openChannel("exec") as ChannelExec
            channel.setCommand(command)

            var prefix: String? = null
            val lfile = localPath

            if (File(lfile).isDirectory) {
                prefix = lfile + File.separator
            }
            // get I/O streams for remote scp
            val outputStream = channel.outputStream
            val inputStream = channel.inputStream

            channel.connect()

            val buf = ByteArray(1024)

            // send '\0'
            buf[0]=0; outputStream.write(buf, 0, 1); outputStream.flush();

            while(true){
                log.info("input file $remotePath $localPath")
                val c = checkAck(inputStream)
                if(c != 'C'.toInt()){
                    break
                }

                // read '0644 '
                inputStream.read(buf, 0, 5)

                var filesize = 0L
                while(true){
                    if(inputStream.read(buf, 0, 1)<0){
                        // error
                        break;
                    }
                    if(buf[0] == ' '.toByte()) break
                    filesize = filesize * 10L + (buf[0] - '0'.toByte()).toLong()
                }

                var file:String? = null

                var i=0
                while (true) {
                    inputStream.read(buf, i, 1)
                    if(buf[i] == 0x0a.toByte()) {
                        file = String (buf, 0, i)
                        break
                    }
                    i++
                }

                //System.out.println("filesize="+filesize+", file="+file);

                // send '\0'
                buf[0]=0; outputStream.write(buf, 0, 1); outputStream.flush()

                // read a content of lfile
                val fos = FileOutputStream(if (prefix==null ) lfile else  prefix+file)
                var foo:Int?
                while(true){
                    if(buf.size < filesize) foo=buf.size
                    else foo = filesize.toInt()
                    foo = inputStream.read(buf, 0, foo)
                    if(foo<0){
                        // error
                        break
                    }
                    fos.write(buf, 0, foo)
                    filesize -= foo
                    if(filesize==0L) break
                }
                fos.close()
    //            fos = null;

                if(checkAck(inputStream)!=0){
                    return ""
                }

                // send '\0'
                buf[0]=0; outputStream.write(buf, 0, 1); outputStream.flush();
            }

            log.info("return input file $remotePath $localPath")
            return localPath
        } catch(e:Exception){
            log.error("get remote file error $remotePath $localPath ", e)
            try {
                fos?.close()
            } catch (ee:Exception) {
                log.error("close fos error $remotePath $localPath ", ee)
            }
        }

        return ""
    }

    @Throws(IOException::class)
    fun checkAck(`in`: InputStream): Int {
        val b = `in`.read()
        // b may be 0 for success,
        //          1 for error,
        //          2 for fatal error,
        //          -1
        if (b == 0) return b
        if (b == -1) return b
        if (b == 1 || b == 2) {
            val sb = StringBuffer()
            var c: Int
            do {
                c = `in`.read()
                sb.append(c.toChar())
            } while (c != '\n'.toInt())
            if (b == 1) { // error
                log.error(sb.toString())
            }
            if (b == 2) { // fatal error
                log.error(sb.toString())
            }
        }
        return b
    }

    companion object {
        fun hexToByte(hexString :String?) :ByteArray? {
            return hexString?.let {
                check(hexString.length % 2 == 0) {
                    "Must have an even length"
                }
                return hexString.chunked(2)
                    .map { it.toInt(16).toByte() }
                    .toByteArray()
            }
        }
    }
}

使用rsa 私钥登录

  1. 因为jsch目前不更新了，所以不兼容最新版本 openssh 的key

需要先将 id_rsa 转换成低版本的 https://stackoverflow.com/questions/53134212/invalid-privatekey-when-using-jsch

ssh-keygen -p -f file -m pem -P passphrase -N passphrase

# 如果密码为空字符串 就敲下面的命令
ssh-keygen -p -f path/to/rsa_file  -m pem -P  "" -N ""
  1. 代码
Session session = jsch.getSession(username, host, port);

         jsch.addIdentity(this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource(rsa_file).getPath());

java.util.Properties config = new java.util.Properties();
config.put("StrictHostKeyChecking", "no");
session.setConfig(config);

session.connect(30000);   // making a connection with timeout.
